materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a concert hall in the Botanical Gardens in Batavia (Jakarta), Indonesia. The concert hall has decorated roofs and shuttered windows. The building has a small porch on the left. The edges of the photographs are curved. The title is written at the bottom, below the photographs.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Concert Hall, Botanical Gardens, Batavia, Java
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Jakarta (Indonesia) Music-halls Colonization Kebun Raya Bogor
